CINE_FromPLA.synopsis: Cinematic Cutscene with the character using an elevator to get from the Zhentarim Hideout to the Underdark
CINE_FromPLA.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 248 -1904. SetGlobalOsirisFlag PLA_ZhentDungeon_State_LiftFixed5. Click on the lift.6. ReCon: "oe und_cine_reset" -  this will allow to see the cinematic again when clicking on the lift (by default the game shows it only once)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The session names suggest potential narrative links. The two sessions labeled 'SHA'—namely 'CINE_FromSHA' and 'CINE_ToSHA'—imply a narrative sequence: one is about leaving (from) a location and the other about arriving (to) that same or a related location. Therefore, it makes sense that the dialog session 'CINE_FromSHA' should occur before 'CINE_ToSHA'. The third session, 'CINE_FromPLA', has a detailed synopsis that describes a cinematic cutscene triggered by using an elevator in the Zhentarim Hideout to get to the Underdark. There is no narrative hint that it is directly related (in terms of cause or consequence) to the 'SHA' sessions, nor is there any evidence indicating either ordering or mutual exclusiveness with them. As a result, no ordering or exclusivity constraint is imposed on 'CINE_FromPLA'.
